title: Special!!! $1000 Look & Lease PLUS 2 weeks free!!!
posting_body: ['Berkeley Central', '2055 Center Street, Berkeley, CA, 94704', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 13', 'OR Text', '13', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Berkeley CentralBerkeley Central Live In Luxury Steps Away From Everything You Love Downtown...', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 865 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Now leasing brand new artist loft-style homes with breathtaking views and condo quality finishes and best housing Berkeley has to offer!', 'A city where home-grown businesses are preferred to the chain stores, where creating a unique identity is expected, and where supporting the local restaurants and galleries is embedded in the fabric of the culture.', 'Are you searching for apartments for rent in Berkeley, CA?', 'Now there is a new place to call home in the center of Downtown Berkeley—Berkeley Central; a modern, new for rent residential property featuring 134 limited-edition loft-style residences and nine spectacular penthouses created to provide the exceptional Berkeley experience just steps from everything!', 'Features', '- Bosch and Meiele Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Wood Flooring', '- Gas Range', '- Private decks and balconies*', '- Composite Quartz Countertops', '- Washer and Dryer in Each Unit', '- Extended High Ceilings', '- Wall to Wall Windows', '- Forced Air Heat and Air Conditioning', '- Tiled Backsplash Kitchen', '*Select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Secure Access Building', '- Underground Parking', '- On-Site City Car Share Service', '- Rooftop Terrace with Wi-Fi', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 8:00AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'pnu2YXRN']
